thread.title: Drake Shows Off Dance Moves in 'Hotline Bling' Music Video
thread.title_full: Drake Shows Off Dance Moves in 'Hotline Bling' Music Video

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Drake Shows Off Dance Moves in 'Hotline Bling' Music Video
text:
Comments Drizzy sings and dances alone in front of several backdrops with different colors in the visuals for his latest smashing hit. 
The long wait for Drake 's "Hotline Bling" music video is finally over. As promised, the Canadian rapper dropped the official visuals for his latest smashing hit on late Monday night, October 19 via Apple Music. The clip opens with a bunch of ladies working in a call center. Later, Drake is seen singing and dancing alone in front of several backdrops with different colors and on a staircase. A girl joins him towards the end of the video. "Hotline Bling" was first debuted in July amid Drizzy's feud with Meek Mill . Currently spending its second week at No. 2 on Billboard Hot 100, the track has been expected to become the 28-year-old star's first to top the esteemed singles chart. Drizzy recently responded to the expectation in an Instagram post. He said that having the song at the list's No. 1 would be "the biggest moment of my career to date." "If you are looking for me on that particular evening I will be passed out in the water slide that connects to our pool," he joked before thanking his fans, "I love you and thank you for these memories. I always love the moment right before it happens more than when it actually happens. So thank you ... even if it doesn't."
